item.title: Saved 500 Kbytes of autoload classmap with autoload-dev at @AtrapaloEng
item.description: This week, at Atr√°palo, we have reviewed our autoloading Composer configuration to use PSR-4 and split production classmap from development classmap to save some space in our Opcache. The result, 500 Kbytes less. Let’s see some details.
